overview: Ahn-ha Moo-in's chaebol wife, Mi-yeong, changed her housekeeper and golf teacher. Mi-yeong's golf instructor, Dong-won, feels sorry for the new maid Ok-jeong who is working at Mi-yeong's house, and offers to get revenge on Mi-yeong. Even Mi-yeong's husband, Il-ryong, who cares more about kind Ok-jeong. What will happen to Mi-yeong and Ok-jeong?
title: Madam's Golf Lesson
